entry.title: BIP 16/17 deadlines
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community, has begun a discussion on Bitcointalk regarding BIP 16/17 support and how to improve the testing process. He provides a link for users to join in on the conversation in hopes of keeping the discussion in one place. It is unclear what specific changes he is hoping to make to BIP 16/17, but it appears he is seeking input from the community on how to move forward.
